LanguageData.EnableHardEjectionTooltip: If enabled, overflow of items from the storages will be forcibly ejected on floor, to meet the specified criteria
LanguageData.DisplayLogFactorInfo: Stack limit slider in storages is not linear for usability. If your item stacks can store thousands of items, set this value higher (default 3.0)
LanguageData.DisplayLogFactorExample: And here you can see how this modifier works:
LanguageData.DisplayLogFactorExampleNote: (this slider has no effect on anything)
LanguageData.PressIfStackSizeChangedRuntime: Press if you changed stack size after starting the game by mods
LanguageData.PercentageMode: Use percentage instead of item count
LanguageData.MultistackModeEnabledGlobalTooltip: Multistack enabled for every storage. Enable it if you dont like checkbox in storage settings
LanguageData.MultistackModeEnabledPerStorageTooltip: Multistack can be enabled or disabled for each storage individually. No performance cost
LanguageData.MultistackInfo: Multistack means how many item stacks can be placed in one world cell. Many custom storages can handle more that one stack.\nNo affect unrestricted storages. Expect that similar items cannot be multistacked for fit in criteria
